metadata.title: CVE-2024-46868 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:firmware: qcom: uefisecapp: Fix deadlock in qcuefi_acquire()If the __qcuefi pointer is not set, then in the original code, we wouldhold onto the lock.  That means that if we tried to set it later, thenit would cause a deadlock.  Drop the lock on the error path.  That'swhat all the callers are expecting.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-46868` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.11.0-8-generic - 6.11.0-8.8
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-8-generic - 6.11.0-8.8
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-8-generic-64k - 6.11.0-8.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-aws - 6.11.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-azure - 6.11.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1002-gcp - 6.11.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-lowlatency - 6.11.0-1004.4
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-lowlatency-64k - 6.11.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1006-oracle - 6.11.0-1006.6
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1006-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.11.0-1004-raspi - 6.11.0-1004.4
No subscription required
